column4: how do i install a package from an installed ppa, the package is named the same as one in regular ubuntu, and the regular ubuntu is a newer version
but i want the ppa version
disable the default repo in sources, then apt-get update, then install the package and pin it to prevent updates, then re-enable default repos
also intalling like this should work: apt-get install foobar=2.25.91-0ubuntu1
